nodes.text: The D'Armin Syndicate was an organization that operated during the time of the Galactic Empire. After the D'Armin Syndicate attacked a supply ship of the Tagge Corporation, led by Lady Domina Tagge of the Tagge family, news of the attack led to a drop for the Tagge Corporation in the Hadi system. In retaliation for the attack, Tagge ordered her assistant Lapin to have a battleship cut the D'Armin Syndicate off at the Feriae Junction, disable their engines and weapons, and push them into the sun a day later.
